name: Đi Về
description:
Đi Về is a story of love, loss, grieving, and acceptance. Two players, embodying a moth and an ethereal light, will journey together - each relying on the abilities of the other to progress. Đi Về is designed to be an emotional and reflective experience. There is no death, danger, or way to “lose” the game. Players’ cooperation will be rewarded with a glimpse into the past, seeing fragments of memories that contribute to a deeper story. Đi Về is a game for players who enjoy aesthetically-pleasing, low-stress, cooperative gameplay accompanied by a narrative that requires interpretation. This game can be played and enjoyed regardless of language, and uses simple controls that allow players from a range of differing abilities to successfully navigate the gameworld. Inspired by true events.

Original game made for Global Game Jam 2019
